item.description: I am a Ph.D. student at Computer Graphics and Geometry Laboratory (EPFL), supervised by Prof. Mark Pauly. The topic of my study mainly focuses on 3D assemblies. Particularly, my works are used to design 3D interlocking puzzles. I am also a Ph.D. researcher at NCCR Digital Fabrication where we develop computational methods for Spatial Timber Assemblies and Large-Span Self-Supporting Assemblies.
